plugins.userTrackingPermission: Classima wants to track you to collect IDFA to deliver personalised ads.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Classima uses the camera to capture and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Classima needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Classima needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Classima usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Classima usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Classima uses device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Classima uses your microphone while taking video of your product for uploading in listing information.
